article.title: Guident Technologies Awarded Contract to Support Department of Homeland Security
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Guident Technologies has been awarded a contract by the U.S. Department of Homeland Security (DHS) to establish a department-wide decision support system. The new system, known as the System for Management Analyses and Resource Tracking (SMART), will enable improved visibility into project level issues, better reporting capabilities and enhanced oversight/control over major investments across the DHS. The contract has a potential value of $2.5 million. Guident will provide management oversight and technical support for the planning, designing, prototyping and implementation of SMART.
